const termsPage=[{title:'General Information',content:'Welcome to La Flora Boutique. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully before placing an order or using any of our services. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our site.
 
'},{title:'Use of Website',content:' • You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict or inhibit their use of the site. 
'+' • You must not attempt to access unauthorized areas or data, transmit harmful content, or disrupt the normal operation of the website. 
 
'},{title:'Product Information',content:' • We make every effort to provide accurate product descriptions, images, and prices. However, flowers are natural products and may vary in color, size, and arrangement. 
'+' • Product availability is subject to change without notice due to seasonal and supply factors. 
 
'},{title:'Ordering',content:' • All orders placed through our website or customer service channels are subject to acceptance, product availability, and verification to ensure accuracy and prevent fraud. 
'+' • We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any orders at our discretion for any reason, including suspected fraudulent activity, incorrect pricing, or other concerns related to order validity and security. 
'+' • Confirmation of your order will be sent via email once accepted. 
 
'},{title:'Payment',content:' • Payment terms and methods will be presented during the ordering process. 
'+' • La Flora Boutique does not process payments on the website unless explicitly stated. Payments may be arranged via phone, in-person, or other approved methods. 
'+' • All payments must be completed before delivery or pickup. 
 
'},{title:'Delivery',content:' • Delivery times are estimated and may vary due to weather, traffic, or other unforeseen events. 
'+' • We are not responsible for delays outside our control but will communicate promptly if issues arise. 
'+' • Delivery areas, fees, and policies are detailed on our Delivery page. 
 
'},{title:'Cancellation and Changes',content:' • Orders can be canceled or changed only within 2 hours of placement. 
'+' • After this period, changes or cancellations may not be possible due to the perishable nature of products. 
 
'},{title:'Intellectual Property',content:' • All content on the website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is the property of La Flora Boutique or its licensors and protected by copyright and trademark laws. 
'+' • Unauthorized use, copying, or reproduction of any content is prohibited. 
 
'},{title:'Privacy',content:' • We collect and use your personal information per our Privacy Policy, available on our website. 
'+' • By using our site, you consent to the data practices described therein. 
 
'},{title:'Limitation of Liability',content:' • La Flora Boutique shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising directly or indirectly from the use or inability to use our products or services. 
'+' • Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the product or service. 
 
'},{title:'Governing Law and Jurisdiction',content:' • These Terms & Conditions are governed by and construed in strict accordance with the laws of the state in which La Flora Boutique operates. 
'+' • Any disputes arising shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the relevant courts in that jurisdiction. 
 
'},{title:'Changes to Terms',content:' • TWe reserve the right to modify or update these Terms & Conditions at any time without prior notice. 
'+' • TUpdated terms and conditions will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the website constitutes full acceptance of the revised and updated terms. 
 
'}];export default termsPage;
